DOC.brief_summary: This is a multi-center double-blind parallel-group study in involutional osteoporosis patients to compare the efficacy and safety of monthly oral intermittent formulation ONO-5920/YM529 with its daily formulation.
DOC.brief_title: ONO-5920/YM529 Confirmatory Study in Involutional Osteoporosis Patients
DOC.criteria: Patients whose bone mineral density is <70% of Young Adult Mean (YAM), or <80% of YAM who have fragile fracture history Patients can walk on his/her own Written informed consent has been obtained from the patient.
